description.value: The code used to identify the status of the patient as of the CLM_THRU_DT. Source: https://bluebutton.cms.gov/resources/variables/ptnt_dschrg_stus_cd

display.value: Unknown Value (but present in data)

definition.value: Unknown Value (but present in data)

display.value: Discharged to home/self-care (routine charge).

definition.value: Discharged to home/self-care (routine charge).

display.value: Discharged/transferred to other short term general hospital for inpatient care.

definition.value: Discharged/transferred to other short term general hospital for inpatient care.

display.value: Discharged/transferred to skilled nursing facility (SNF) with Medicare certification in anticipation of covered skilled care -- (For hospitals with an approved swing bed arrangement, use Code 61 - swing bed. For reporting discharges/transfers to a non-certified SNF, the hospital must use Code 04 - ICF.

definition.value: Discharged/transferred to skilled nursing facility (SNF) with Medicare certification in anticipation of covered skilled care -- (For hospitals with an approved swing bed arrangement, use Code 61 - swing bed. For reporting discharges/transfers to a non-certified SNF, the hospital must use Code 04 - ICF.

display.value: Discharged/transferred to intermediate care facility (ICF).

definition.value: Discharged/transferred to intermediate care facility (ICF).

display.value: Discharged/transferred to another type of institution for inpatient care (including distinct parts). NOTE: Effective 1/2005, psychiatric hospital or psychiatric distinct part unit of a hospital will no longer be identified by this code. New code is '65'.

definition.value: Discharged/transferred to another type of institution for inpatient care (including distinct parts). NOTE: Effective 1/2005, psychiatric hospital or psychiatric distinct part unit of a hospital will no longer be identified by this code. New code is '65'.

display.value: Discharged/transferred to home care of organized home health service organization.

definition.value: Discharged/transferred to home care of organized home health service organization.

display.value: Left against medical advice or discontinued care.

definition.value: Left against medical advice or discontinued care.

display.value: Discharged/transferred to home under care of a home IV drug therapy provider. (discontinued effective 10/1/05)

definition.value: Discharged/transferred to home under care of a home IV drug therapy provider. (discontinued effective 10/1/05)

display.value: Admitted as an inpatient to this hospital (effective 3/1/91). In situations where a patient is admitted before midnight of the third day following the day of an outpatient service, the outpatient services are considered inpatient.

definition.value: Admitted as an inpatient to this hospital (effective 3/1/91). In situations where a patient is admitted before midnight of the third day following the day of an outpatient service, the outpatient services are considered inpatient.

display.value: Expired (patient did not recover).

definition.value: Expired (patient did not recover).

display.value: Discharged/transferred to court/law enforcement.

definition.value: Discharged/transferred to court/law enforcement.

display.value: Still patient.

definition.value: Still patient.

display.value: Expired at home (hospice claims only)

definition.value: Expired at home (hospice claims only)

display.value: Expired in a medical facility such as hospital, SNF, ICF, or freestanding hospice. (Hospice claims only)

definition.value: Expired in a medical facility such as hospital, SNF, ICF, or freestanding hospice. (Hospice claims only)

display.value: Expired - place unknown (Hospice claims only)

definition.value: Expired - place unknown (Hospice claims only)

display.value: Discharged/transferred to a federal hospital (eff. 10/1/03)

definition.value: Discharged/transferred to a federal hospital (eff. 10/1/03)

display.value: Discharged/transferred to a Hospice – home.

definition.value: Discharged/transferred to a Hospice – home.

display.value: Discharged/transferred to a Hospice – medical facility.

definition.value: Discharged/transferred to a Hospice – medical facility.

display.value: Discharged/transferred within this institution to a hospital-based Medicare approved swing bed (eff. 9/01)

definition.value: Discharged/transferred within this institution to a hospital-based Medicare approved swing bed (eff. 9/01)

display.value: Discharged/transferred to an inpatient rehabilitation facility including distinct parts units of a hospital. (eff. 1/2002)

definition.value: Discharged/transferred to an inpatient rehabilitation facility including distinct parts units of a hospital. (eff. 1/2002)

display.value: Discharged/transferred to a long term care hospitals. (eff. 1/2002)

definition.value: Discharged/transferred to a long term care hospitals. (eff. 1/2002)

display.value: Discharged/transferred to a nursing facility certified under Medicaid but not under Medicare (eff. 10/2002)

definition.value: Discharged/transferred to a nursing facility certified under Medicaid but not under Medicare (eff. 10/2002)

display.value: Discharged/Transferred to a psychiatric hospital or psychiatric distinct unit of a hospital (these types of hospitals were pulled from patient/discharge status code '05' and given their own code). (eff. 1/2005).

definition.value: Discharged/Transferred to a psychiatric hospital or psychiatric distinct unit of a hospital (these types of hospitals were pulled from patient/discharge status code '05' and given their own code). (eff. 1/2005).

display.value: Discharged/transferred to a Critical Access Hospital (CAH) (eff. 1/1/06)

definition.value: Discharged/transferred to a Critical Access Hospital (CAH) (eff. 1/1/06)

display.value: Discharged/transferred to a designated disaster alternative care site (starting 10/2013; applies only to particular MS-DRGs*)

definition.value: Discharged/transferred to a designated disaster alternative care site (starting 10/2013; applies only to particular MS-DRGs*)

display.value: Discharged/transferred to another type of health care institution not defined elsewhere in code list.

definition.value: Discharged/transferred to another type of health care institution not defined elsewhere in code list.

display.value: Discharged/transferred/referred to another institution for outpatient services as specified by the discharge plan of care (eff. 9/01) (discontinued effective 10/1/05)

definition.value: Discharged/transferred/referred to another institution for outpatient services as specified by the discharge plan of care (eff. 9/01) (discontinued effective 10/1/05)

display.value: Discharged/transferred/referred to this institution for outpatient services as specified by the discharge plan of care (eff. 9/01) (discontinued effective 10/1/05) The following codes apply only to particular MS-DRGs*, and were new in 10/2013:

definition.value: Discharged/transferred/referred to this institution for outpatient services as specified by the discharge plan of care (eff. 9/01) (discontinued effective 10/1/05) The following codes apply only to particular MS-DRGs*, and were new in 10/2013:
